'''Gift of "Parting"''' is a Quest Item obtained during the {{Quest|The Phantom Thief's Reappearance}}.

Upon finishing ''[[The Truest Thing]]'', it is combined with a [[Rainbow Rose]] given by Lyney and transforms into [["Delightful Encounter"]].
